TopicTitle: Squad: could we get all companies' logo in high-resolution please ?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

could it be possible to get the 0.24 companies logo in HR (or original pictures files) please ?

The small PNG images are very small and aren't good enough to create custom texture for skinning for example.

I have think of adding all companies in my advertizing mod but just can't or I would have to spend hours/days to recreate each single logo (finding the right font, recreate shape, ...).

Even in the contest result threads, pictures are the small useless PNG :/.

Thanks

The contest result thread is the best you're going to get, I think; the images there might be in their original resolution (I'm not sure what the requirements were).

Depends which you meant though. They don't seem very small here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/289-Eighteen-0-24-Company-Logos-Revealed!
this logos in that thread arent high res... i would love to see them highres or as vector too!!!

Reinforced: pleeeeeeze, Squad?

Kerbpaint makes my laptop cry, but I must have racing livery for the Minmus championships.

Make it happen?
Sadly there was no answer yet, maybe by putting some people names here it may work, Rowsdower have you see this thread ? Please, could you give some answer ? Even a "NO WE DON'T, NEVER !"

I can ask, but it doesn't look good from here. Last I knew, a number of the images had to be sized up in order to achieve a consistent look in the game out of the material we had to work with. The originals were a mixed bag of low and hi res images.

I can ask, but it doesn't look good from here. Last I knew, a number of the images had to be sized up in order to achieve a consistent look in the game out of the material we had to work with. The originals were a mixed bag of low and hi res images.

OK, thanks for the answer. It would be great if we can get the most of hi-res/vector logo that's have been made, any chance to contact author to know if they have some higher res logo ?
I'd be happy to oblige provided SQUAD gives the OK. I think the best bet is probably for you guys to get an OK from SQUAD to contact the logo makers directly
